mapper.sql:
SELECT entd_pk, entd_enti_pk, entd_tpdt_pk, entd_grupo, entd_fila, entd_orden, entd_span, entd_obligatorio , entd_gridable, entd_filtrable, entd_valor_defecto , tpdt_pk, tpdt_tipo_elemento, tpdt_tipo_html , enti_pk, enti_codigo, enti_tipo, enti_puerto
, ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'entd' AND i18n_ext_pk = entd_pk AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) AS entd_etiqueta , ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'tpdt' AND i18n_ext_pk = tpdt_pk AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) AS tpdt_nombre , ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'enti' AND i18n_ext_pk = enti_pk AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) AS enti_nombre
FROM tbl_entidad_tipo_dato_entd entd JOIN tbl_tipo_dato_tpdt tpdt ON tpdt.tpdt_pk = entd.entd_tpdt_pk LEFT JOIN tbl_entidad_enti enti ON enti.enti_pk = tpdt.tpdt_enti_pk
mapper.select: ORDER BY entd.entd_enti_pk, entd.entd_grupo, entd.entd_fila, entd.entd_orden
